title: Mouse and Keyboard Won't Work in Game
body: This is getting a little ridiculous. This doesn't always happen. Most of the time it doesn't. But on a few occasions, I load into game, everything seems normal, but I can't click anything. My keyboard doesn't work either. It will let me move the camera around, and the mouse pointer changes when I mouse over things (for example, mousing over the shop turns the pointer into a coin purse). It's really frustrating, and causes me to get penalized for being afk. Hopefully there is a solution to this. I have tried deleting the input.ini file and deleting the input.ini text in the config file. Note: I am using a razer black widow keyboard and a razer deathadder mouse.

replies.body: Use Discord? If I hit the hotkey combo for the overlay (shift+`) it would toggle between a windows cursor and the LoL hand cursor. Disable the overlay. Stupid Discord.
I wanna upvote you so many times you dont even UNDERSTAND!!! {{sticker:sg-lux}}
This is what happened to me. I disabled the discord overlay and pressed shift + tilda. It didn't allow me to use my keyboard or mouse but also didn't look like anything.
Delite discord and than will work
^^ THIS HELPS!

It's because of ~~**Discord~**~ and some hotkey combinations. Simply open **"Discord"** and go to "**Games**" and there switch it to "**OVERLAY: OFF**". (switch all games if u happen to have same issue with them also). U may wanna try this in custom game or something while live in a game so u know it started working. Worked for me instantly. Hope this helps!
omg ty bro....finally found a problem ....this is so stupid i lost 2 ranked games becuz of this stupid discord
THANK YOU OMG

That sounds pretty frustrating!  Your config settings might be corrupt, and not able to receive your input.  Resetting it should fix this up!

Log into the game client.
Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly.  Leave game to sync settings. 

Let me know if that helps.
